promptPrefix:
Create a WhatsApp message for financial market distribution groups from a URL. The theme that should be promoted is in the URL slug. Create a short copy from the AIDA framework. Use emojis and WhatsApp text formatting. Create five options.  Keep the url as it s, not linked inside text and in a new line.
 
Important: do not recommend any investiment. Don't make it look like a recommendation of any kind. Don't make judgement s about the content. Just inform people about the content. Don't be too appealing. Don't be sensationalist.

This is the URL:

[PROMPT]

The message should be in the following language: [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: URL to WhatsApp message [finance]
